title: Keyword Research For Low Content Books For KDP  - Are your keywords indexed?
description:
Hi Home Bosses,
In this video I will be talking about keyword research for low content books for kdp and in particular how you know that your keywords are indexed.
Hope you enjoy the video, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to leave them in the comments. See you again soon!

If you want to know how to publish your first low content book, start here: https://thehomeboss.com/how-to-publish-your-first-low-content-book-on-amazon-kdp-for-beginners/
